author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: و امّا در این ظهور اظهر و سلطنت عظمی جمعی از علمای راشدین و فضلای کاملین و فقهای بالغین از کأس قرب و وصال مرزوق شدند و بعنایت عظمی فائز گشتند و از کون و امکان در سبیل جانان گذشتند...
translation: In this most resplendent Dispensation, however, this most mighty Sovereignty, a number of illumined divines, of men of consummate learning, of doctors of mature wisdom, have attained unto His Court, drunk the cup of His divine Presence, and been invested with the honor of His most excellent favor. They have renounced, for the sake of the Beloved, the world and all that is therein.…
